system.description: At 6th level you gain an additional two Empowered Turning options. These must be chosen from @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.r0l03ssybb7nmwdy]{Command Undead} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.wwk94syro18y9892]{Destroy Undead}. In addition, all undead creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against your attempts to turn, command, or destroy them.
